title: The Instant Pot Ultra Is the High-Tech Brother to the Duo—And It’s on Sale
text:
Have you gotten yourself an Instant Pot yet? If the answer is no, we have a deal that you won’t want to pass up. The Instant Pot Ultra is the elevated version of the original, best-selling Instant Pot and it’s on sale for $84.

Unlike the classic Instant Pot Duo, the Ultra has a sleek central dial that allows you to easily and precisely control your cooking. It has a cooking indicator to give you a full read on what your food is doing, a steam release reset button in case you released too early, and an attitude adjustment for those who live way above or below sea level (yes, this affects how you cook). The Ultra also has a microprocessor that gives you all the high-tech reads you could need to create a meal that’s unlike any you’ve had. You can customize temperature, set your own custom programming, or use one of the new programs like to perfectly bake a cake or sterilize the inner pot. Basically, the Instant Pot Ultra does everything for you and if that’s not what the future promised, I don’t know what is. | Get it on Amazon >

description: The Ultra lets you do more with your Instant Pot than any other model.
